entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High 24. Humidex 25. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023
